**Introduction**

I created the Covid-19 Dashboard using Tableau. To view the viz, click [here](https://public.tableau.com/profile/o6aid#!/vizhome/nCovDashboard/COVID-19Outbreak)

Do follow me and like my viz. Also, leave any comments that can help me improve the dashboard, or also if i need to revisit certain metrics displayed on the dashboard.
